The user uses [[Lightning Release|electromagnetic powers]] to absorb the [[Iron Sand|iron sand]] in a swirling vortex around themselves and expand their body's size to that of a 20-meter tall giant.<ref>Gaara Hiden: A Sandstorm Mirage, Page 8</ref> Due to their size, their footsteps then crush the graphite in the earth and cause electric discharge.<ref>Gaara Hiden: A Sandstorm Mirage, Page 11.</ref> The thunderclap of these discharges were powerful enough to cause [[Suna]] shinobi to lose their footing.<ref>Gaara Hiden: A Sandstorm Mirage, Page 9</ref> [[Kankurō]] described it as an {{translation|[[Absolute Defence|absolute defence]]|絶対防御|zettai bōgyo}} technique, noting its incredible speed.<ref>Gaara Hiden: A Sandstorm Mirage, Page 13</ref> Additionally, the electromagnetic field used to maintain the form caused anyone who came into direct contact with the body to be scattered into bits the instance they touch it.<ref>Gaara Hiden: A Sandstorm Mirage, Page 14</ref>
